name: Space In Station
description:
Space station has exploded! With your limited supplies, you can gather all valuables back together! ✨

This has been a week long experiment about puzzle platformers, big thanks to:

  • Kenney assets (kenney.nl)
  • Menu music by Sketchylogic (opengameart.org)
  • All other music and sounds by Juhani Junkala (opengameart.org)

This is still in heavy dev mode, but have fun building your own maps or edit the existing ones! Oh yeah, options does nothing - theres no options 😎

Keyboard + Mouse:

Move: Mouse

Jump: Mouse Left

Reset: Space/Enter/Mouse Right

Pause Menu: Esc

Controller:

Move: Left Stick

Jump: A

Reset: Y

Pause Menu: Start

Editor:

Editor menu comes out if you click the small "editor" tab on the right.

Select / Move: Mouse Left

Rotate (annoying): Mouse Right
